content: What's the mechanism for adding an invariant to an extension? Would I add an Invariants tab to an extension spreadsheet (and would it work if I did)? Or is there another way that I've so far missed seeing?
I think there's an example for invariants, but it would extension-invariants
I'm not finding anything like this so far. Anything else to help narrow the search?
I know I've done it, but I have absolutely no recollection of where :(
I was looking for something in DAF, but hadn't located anything yet - that should help - thanks
